text: Yeah currently not possible but you could definitely throw the idea in community forum for more visibility: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/gh-p/crm-development-tools-beta>

Hey everyone, do you think that sometime in the near future, we will be allowed to modify the CORS rules for our serverless functions?  It would be great to be able to set up a serverless function that can act as a webhook for a 3rd party platform.

You can already do part of this, I use a serverless function as a webhook for stripe. You can't limit the CORS rules to only accept <http://stripe.com|stripe.com> domains though (which would be very nice)
